name: Zoofice
description:
We get it, work can get pretty tough somtimes. There's days where you just wanna take a bat to everything and anything in the office - the computer on your desk that hasn't been upgraded since 2003, the water cooler that you and your coworker Jan used to hang out by before you thought dating was a good idea, and that potted plant that really just doesn't tickle your fancy.

Zoofice is a VR game that lets you do just that, while being able to keep your current job (because you're not causing actual significant property damage)!

Rack up as much property damage as you can without being caught by Mr. Otterton, your boss. 

Zoofice requires an HTC Vive or Oculus Rift headset to play.

Developed by Amanda Baker and Henry Klotz.

Controls 

Wave around the controller to break stuff!
